name: heimdallur
short_description:
Heimdallur is a daemon written in erlang to manage users on a large scale hotspot network. Mainly hotspots that utilizes low end soho-routers at the end point with no capabilities other than routing and relaying dhcp. The project's goal is to build a concurrent system that can halde a large number of users on otherwise low end machinery.

I'll write a proper description once I have one; now at the birth of this project the exact funcions of it have not been completely detailed.
summary: HotSpot access gateway control written in erlang for *BSD
